mapper.select: select eventNo, eventSubject, to_char(eventStart, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventStart, to_char(eventEnd, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventEnd, eventImg1 from event where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%' and to_date(eventEnd, 'YY-MM-DD')>sysdate order by eventNo desc

select eventNo, eventSubject, to_char(eventStart, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventStart, to_char(eventEnd, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventEnd from event where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%' and sysdate>to_date(eventEnd, 'YY-MM-DD') order by eventNo desc

select * from (select eventNo, lag(eventNo, 1, 0) over (order by eventNo desc) prevNo, lag(eventSubject, 1, '이전글이 없습니다.') over (order by eventNo desc) prevSubject, lead(eventNo, 1, 0) over (order by eventNo desc) nextNo, lead(eventSubject, 1, '다음글이 없습니다.') over (order by eventNo desc) nextSubject from event where to_date(eventEnd, 'YY-MM-DD')>sysdate) where eventNo=#{param1}

select eventNo, eventSubject, to_char(eventStart, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventStart, to_char(eventEnd, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventEnd, to_char(eventDate, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi') eventDate from event where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%' order by eventNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into event(eventNo, eventSubject, eventContent, eventStart, eventEnd, eventImg1) values(eventsq.nextval, #{eventSubject}, #{eventContent}, #{eventStart}, #{eventEnd}, #{eventImg1})
mapper.select: select eventNo, eventSubject, eventContent, eventImg1, to_char(eventStart, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventStart, to_char(eventEnd, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventEnd, to_char(eventDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') eventDate from event where eventNo=#{param1}
select eventImg1 from event where eventNo=#{param1}
mapper.update: update event set eventSubject=#{eventSubject}, eventContent=#{eventContent}, eventStart=#{eventStart}, eventEnd=#{eventEnd}, eventImg1=#{eventImg1} where eventNo=#{eventNo}
